thread.title: Landrieu, Gusman to meet in federal court of housing inmates
thread.title_full: Landrieu, Gusman to meet in federal court of housing inmates - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Landrieu, Gusman to meet in federal court of housing inmates
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - New Orleans Mayor Mitch Landrieu and Orleans Parish Sheriff Marlin Gusman will meet Friday to discuss the housing of state inmates at the new jail.
Landrieu has been highly critical of Gusman's practice of housing some 300 inmates at the new facility, while shipping some pretrial detainees to other parishes.
In a court filing Tuesday, a federal judge said the meeting will be held in court chambers.
The city funds the jail, and the sheriff operates it.
